section.title: wrapper.console.title
section.para: Setting this property allows the Title Bar of the console in which the Wrapper is running to be set. This works if the Wrapper is running as a console application or as an NT service with the wrapper.ntservice.console property set. The property defaults to no value meaning that the title is not set.

As an alternative, or in addition to this property, it is also possible to set the console title from within the Java application by using the WrapperManager.setConsoleTitle() method. This allows the application to dynamically change the title as the application runs.
